fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value: - Choose to free any players in the Private Correctional Facility if it is being used as Jail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Cards which refer to "Jail" can also treat the Private Correctional Facility as Jail. This tile acts exactly the same as Jail (Space 3). If both this property and Jail exist, players may choose which one to be sent to.
